ygData.subject: Re: Kitting and magic
ygData.msgSnippet: Kitting is simply using a Spirit of Wolf spell(SOW) or Journayman Boots (Jboots) to run faster then MOB so you attack it with spell from maximal distance and
ygData.messageBody:
Kitting is simply using a Spirit of Wolf spell(SOW) or Journayman Boots
(Jboots) to run faster then MOB so you attack it with spell from maximal
distance and then run until you get enough distance to cast a spell again.
It is one of reasons why wizards dont have fast moving spells as they are
best on dealing much damage in short period of time. It is very long tactic
as until you get some distance between you and MOB it takes some time and
it is very very anoying also eheheh 10 - 15 minits for a red kill.






At 01.04 06/07/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Mikaela" <mikaela@...>
